findings.title: User ETHER Units instead of Large Digits
findings.description: Using large digits can be replaced with globally available Ether Units to enhance code readability.

findings.title: Multiplication is being performed on the result of Division
findings.description: During the automated testing of the MasterChef contract, it was found that some of the functions in the contract are performing multiplication on the result of a Division. Integer Divisions in Solidity might truncate. Moreover, this performing division before multiplication might lead to loss of precision.

findings.title: Contract State Variables are being updated after External Calls. Violation of Check_Effects_Interaction Pattern
findings.description: The MasterChef contract includes quite a few functions that update some of the very imperative state variables of the contract after the external calls are being made.
